### Inputs

```{r}

selectInput("categories", label = "Category", choices = categories)

```

Charts
======================================================================
### Chart B

```{r}

plot_data <- reactive({

  tidy_data %>% 
  dplyr::filter(category == input$categories) 
    
})

renderPlot({ 
ggplot2::ggplot(data = plot_data(), aes(x = week, y = value, group = item, colour = item)) +
  geom_line() +
  geom_point() +
  facet_wrap(vars(item))
})

```
